item.title: Second try: 2×5 LED Matrix Arduino controlled
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: This time a more sophisticated example. I started to develop an LED Matrix controller and editor in Processing (like every does his first steps on arduino, I think). By now, you can create a sequence by selecting the LEDs to light up and move over to the next frame. Finished, run it on the Arduino […]
item.content:encoded:
This time a more sophisticated example. I started to develop an LED Matrix controller and editor in Processing (like every does his first steps on arduino, I think).
By now, you can create a sequence by selecting the LEDs to light up and move over to the next frame. Finished, run it on the Arduino and control the speed – a nice and quick toy way to create any light patterns you can think of easily.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vmijzo2zT-s[/youtube]

More examples and source code soon to come…
